content:
if you want to add intro or notes pages to a profile, simply add
structuredefinition-<yourprofile>-intro.md (or xml)
structuredefinition-<yourprofile>-notes.md (or xml)
to the pagecontent folder.
note that the IHE template does not currently support this. there is an issue to fix this, will try to get to it soon
oh, as a intro and notes on the structure definition? I didn't understand that need from @Keith Boone
Well, if we need it, it will be possible
